entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bissett
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
